resources.string: Your layer files should have the same name except for a number at the end of the name, starting with 1 for the topmost layer. Tip: The front layers should be wider to make them scroll faster.
Pick one of the layer files, and I\'ll try to find the rest of them.
Your device doesn\'t seem to support any activity for picking an image, which is slightly odd as most should come with some sort of gallery. Try downloading File Manager from the Market.
